name: Starting Spring
description:
NOTE: At the moment you can select a track (see below)(1 is kick drum, 2 is bass) but nothing else works! And I didn't get round working on the music either...

I intend to continue to finish in the week or so post jam! 

Starting Spring - An attempt at making a game in 48h for 1-Bit Jam with the theme 'One Button'.
'Spring is just one button away. Press it in the right rhythm to activate different tracks of music and help melt the snow, the leaves and flowers to bloom and the animals and insects to awaken.'

Input is only the 'Z' or 'X' key.
Press and hold to activate 'Track Select' where the tracks will cycle through on the beat. Release to select that track.
Then press in rhythm as the symbols line up.
